Class AbstractFigure

java.lang.Object
by.bsuir.oop.shytsikau.graphic.figures.AbstractFigure
All Implemented Interfaces:
Figure
Direct Known Subclasses:
LineSegment, RectangleBounds
public abstract class AbstractFigure extends Object implements Figure
A class that represents starting point of a figure (aka anchor).
